${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:DRGBadge.NAME: DRG Badge
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCrystalline #yCaverns: Apply #b1 #yShock to enemies when you attack them, but take #b1 extra #yBlock damage.
#ySalt #yPits: #yPickaxe cards cost [E] less to play. #yMineral gain is halved.
#yRadioactive #yExclusion #yZone: Deal damage to a random enemy equal to #b25% of your #yMineral count at the end of each turn. Whenever you take damage, lose #yMinerals equal to the damage taken.
#yDense #yBiozone: At the start of combat, spawn a weak enemy. At the start of your turn, add a copy of a card in your hand with #yExhaust and #yEthereal.
#yGlacial #yStrata: At the start of your turn, apply #b1 #yFreeze to all characters.
#yHollow #yBough: Start combat #b3 #yThorns. All enemies start combat with #b1 #yThorns.
#yAzure #yWeald: Heal #b2 after combat. All enemies start combat with #b3 #yRegen.
#yMagma #yCore: At the start of your turn, apply #b1 #yBurn to all characters.
#ySandblasted #yCorridors: Discard #b2 cards then draw #b2 cards at the start of your turn.

${modID}:Phazyionite.NAME: Phazyionite
